title: The Witch, the Christian, and the Outlaw
description: A U.S. Marshal passes out at a saloon.A righteous, teenage cowgirl with magical abilities looks after the unconscious marshal while hooking up with a card-swindling, teenage son of a Pastor to find a famed goldmine, all while pursued by an outlaw sheriff who is after the riches.Blacksnake never considered herself attractive. Long ago, she gave up on trying to live a life the way a 19th Century girl should and became a cowgirl, a gunslinger, intimidating others by her quick reflexes. She suppressed her feelings until, after a long cattle drive, while protecting a passed-out marshal, she meets the tenderfoot Zach from back East. Hooking up with him to follow his stolen map to a goldmine, she tries to straighten his crooked ways to teach him what it’s like to be a real man. And he becomes the first to make her feel comfortable enough to come out of her shell to feel what it’s like to be a girl.It only proves you can hitch a horse with a coyote after all.
author: M. Benjamin Woodall
